sys_documentation.help: When editing a transaction, the Status selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of the Status field. When adding a new transaction, the selected Status will specify the Status, as well as this lookup field.
sys_documentation.hint: When editing a transaction, the Status selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of the Status field. When adding a new transaction, the selected Status will specify the Status, as well as this lookup field.
sys_documentation.label: Status Lookup
sys_documentation.name: x_561190_micro_p_0_transactions
